methods.name: initializeOverlaySpaces
methods.comment: Adds existing overlay spaces to the factory.

params.name: factory
params.comment: the factory to add overlay spaces to

methods.name: addOverlaySpace
methods.comment: Adds a new overlay space to the database

methods.name: removeOverlaySpace
methods.comment: Removes the named space from the database

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the overlay space to remove

methods.name: setLanguage
methods.comment:
Translate overlay address spaces for a new language provider
 and initialize the new addrFactory with the translated overlay spaces.
 All non-overlay address spaces within the address factory should already
 have been mapped to the new language.

params.name: translator
params.comment: language translator to assist with mapping of address spaces
